description:
Lost Dream: Memories
Tells a story of Fox, who wakes up in a unknown place in the middle of a huge valley. Start your journey to find and discover the piece that completes you. Travel through the world, experience the beautiful things a fox can see.

The World
just waiting to be explored! Many different kinds of scenes all very well made to make the experience relaxing and soothing!

Soundscape
Lost Dream: Memories has the highest quality of music you can find! Each track very well picked to suit the current mood. Ambience sounds are also included in the game.
name: Lost Dream: Memories
